posts.post_content:
Holy smokes, they left the old art on here. I felt certain they were going to replace it on account of the gun.  
  
@Kryptnyt - They weren't removed due to being scary, no, but they've said on numerous occasions that they don't want to have certain anachronisms depicted on Magic cards, one of the biggest being guns.

Posted By: KnightOfSerra (4/1/2011 11:32:41 AM)
Rating:

@divine_exodus
"Hey, you want to break into you dad's porn collection or gun cabinet?"

I don't understand modern censorship. Why allow the things that pose a physical threat (acts of extreme violence) yet flip the *** (thanks proving my point, Gatherer) out over a swear word or a bit of nudity on TV? Not saying TV creates real life violence or that censorship is a good thing, just trying to understand the whole hypocrisy.

@sir_dwar
It really depends on the Plane. Like I could see some guns (like hunting rifles) on Innistrad as it seems like they would fit as it appears to be mimicking late 19th century Europe and especially in the Horror theme. Yet they only seem to use Bows and Crossbows. I could also see some form of guns being made on Ravnica, only magic based (And probably Izzet). I really think it is an (unofficial) policy of Wizards, not just an inconvenience of flavor. Whether that is good or bad is up for debate. And really, it doesn't effect the actually game much. It's mai... (see all)
